blogDesc: I started writing articles in December 2021, mainly for software sharing and skills sharing. In total, I have written {{count}} articles on my blog. You can search by title in the search bar below.
SEO_pcSpecsDesc: Specification of PC bought by 小康 in April 2021
SEO_usesDesc: This is the equipment I currently use for gaming, programming, making videos, and every day.
SEO_dashboardDesc: This is my personal dashboard, built with Next.js API routes deployed as serverless functions. I use this dashboard to track various metrics across platforms like YouTube, GitHub, and more.
SEO_guestbookDesc: Sign my guestbook and share your idea.
Guestbook_tip: Your information is only used to display your name and reply by email
404_title: You have found a secret place
404_description: Unfortunately, this is only a 404 page. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.
404_button: Take me back to home page
500_description: Our servers could not handle your request. Don't worry, our development team was already notified. Try refreshing the page.
